verses.text: \w My|strong="H1732"\w* soul waiteth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* silence \w for|strong="H5921"\w* God only: \w From|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \add cometh\add* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* salvation.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* only \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* rock \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*: \add He is\add* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w high|strong="H4480"\w* tower; \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* greatly moved.

\w How|strong="H3444"\w* \w long|strong="H7227"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* set upon \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man, \w That|strong="H1931"\w* \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H1931"\w* slay \add him\add*, all \w of|strong="H6697"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w Like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* leaning wall, \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tottering fence?

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w only|strong="H5704"\w* consult \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w thrust|strong="H1760"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w down|strong="H5186"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* dignity; \w They|strong="H5921"\w* delight \w in|strong="H5921"\w* lies; \w They|strong="H5921"\w* bless \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* mouth, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* curse inwardly. \qs Selah\qs*

\w My|strong="H7130"\w* soul, wait thou \w in|strong="H7130"\w* silence \w for|strong="H7130"\w* God only; \w For|strong="H7130"\w* \w my|strong="H7130"\w* expectation \w is|strong="H6310"\w* from \w him|strong="H7130"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* rock \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* salvation: \add He is\add* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w high|strong="H4480"\w* tower; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* moved.

\w With|strong="H1931"\w* \w God|strong="H6697"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w and|strong="H6697"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* glory: \w The|strong="H3808"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w of|strong="H6697"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w strength|strong="H6697"\w*, \w and|strong="H6697"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4869"\w*, \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H6697"\w*.

\w Trust|strong="H4268"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* times, ye people; Pour \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w God|strong="H6697"\w* \w is|strong="H3519"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*

Surely \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* low degree \w are|strong="H5971"\w* vanity, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* high degree \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lie: \w In|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* balances \w they|strong="H6256"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H5971"\w* \w up|strong="H8210"\w*; \w They|strong="H6256"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w together|strong="H5971"\w* lighter \w than|strong="H3605"\w* vanity.

Trust \w not|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* oppression, \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w become|strong="H3162"\w* \w not|strong="H5927"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* robbery: \w If|strong="H1121"\w* riches increase, \w set|strong="H5927"\w* \w not|strong="H5927"\w* \w your|strong="H5927"\w* heart \add thereon\add*.

God \w hath|strong="H3588"\w* spoken once, Twice \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w*, \w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w power|strong="H2428"\w* belongeth \w unto|strong="H3820"\w* God.

\w Also|strong="H5797"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w thee|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord, belongeth lovingkindness; \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* renderest \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w every|strong="H3588"\w* man according \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* work.
